author: inphi
content: you mean "null" withdrawals (i.e. not empty) is a valid input to ethereumjs' fcu API?

author: m.kalinin
content: Currently spec says that withdrawals must be provided if `timestamp >= SHANGHAI_FORK_TIMESTAMP`, EL must respond with error if the request doesn't adhere to this requirement
